trait.name: Bloodied Fury
entries: While {@status Bloodied|XPHB}, the boar has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 3}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature and the boar moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Piercing damage and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.
